review: The main reason I bought this was to have access to youtube videos since my DirecTV receiver no longer could play them after youtube made some changes to their platform. Amazon is always my first place to see what is available. I am on my 3rd kindle and like the Echo pretty well. I thought I would try the Fire TV. There is lots more than just youtube available and I did not know what I was missing. With a wifi connection you are set to watch almost any videos out there. Of course, many of them cost something but that is my choice if I want to spend the money. Fire TV works perfectly and I have had no issues since getting it a couple of months ago. As of today, I have not fully used all of its features, but I love the ones I have used. Those include youtube, Prime TV, NetFlix, TuneIn and putting my pictures and videos from my computer to my TV. I have not tried the alternatives that are out there but I can't see how anyone could be disappointed with the Fire TV.
author: Wesley H. Brown Jr. "WBJr"
